description:
The invention is a set of algorithms and calculations for a performance-based
model to translate wildfire burn potential to actual transmission line outages
in real-time in an interactive application that uses geospatial data sets on the
wildfire burn potential as well as detailed grid topographical datasets.
name: Wildfires Risk Evaluation of the System (WiRES) Framework Tool

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
